participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

ders_attn_awareness_p.Description: My child pays attention to how he/she feels | 1=almost never ; 2=sometimes ; 3=about half the time ; 4=most of the time ; 5=almost always ; 777=Refuse to Answer

ders_clear_feelings_p.Description: My child is clear about his/her feelings | 1=almost never ; 2=sometimes ; 3=about half the time ; 4=most of the time ; 5=almost always ; 777=Refuse to Answer

ders_emotion_overwhelm_p.Description: My child experiences his/her emotions as overwhelming and out of control | 1=almost never ; 2=sometimes ; 3=about half the time ; 4=most of the time ; 5=almost always ; 777=Refuse to Answer

ders_feelings_attentive_p.Description: My child is attentive to his/her feelings. | 1=almost never ; 2=sometimes ; 3=about half the time ; 4=most of the time ; 5=almost always ; 777=Refuse to Answer

ders_feelings_care_p.Description: My child cares about what he/she is feeling. | 1=almost never ; 2=sometimes ; 3=about half the time ; 4=most of the time ; 5=almost always ; 777=Refuse to Answer

ders_feelings_know_p.Description: My child knows exactly how he/she is feeling. | 1=almost never ; 2=sometimes ; 3=about half the time ; 4=most of the time ; 5=almost always ; 777=Refuse to Answer

ders_upset_ack_p.Description: When my child is upset, he/she acknowledges his/her emotions | 1=almost never ; 2=sometimes ; 3=about half the time ; 4=most of the time ; 5=almost always ; 777=Refuse to Answer

ders_upset_angry_p.Description: When my child is upset, he/she becomes angry with him/herself for feeling that way. | 1=almost never ; 2=sometimes ; 3=about half the time ; 4=most of the time ; 5=almost always ; 777=Refuse to Answer

ders_upset_ashamed_p.Description: When my child is upset, he/she feels ashamed with him/herself for feeling that way. | 1=almost never ; 2=sometimes ; 3=about half the time ; 4=most of the time ; 5=almost always ; 777=Refuse to Answer
